About Me

Hello!

My name is Frederick Adarode and I'm  

As a dedicated creative designer, my passion for design drives my unwavering commitment to excellence. I continually invest in professional development to refine my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving design landscape.

With two years of expertise as a frontend web app developer, I specialize in HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, Angular, React, NextJS, Expo and the Ionic Framework, seamlessly complemented by backend proficiency in Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Additionally, I bring experience in email marketing, enabling me to create holistic digital solutions. Fueled by a passion for innovation and a growth mindset, I thrive in collaborative environments where ideas are transformed into extraordinary digital experiences. Let's work together to bring your vision to life!
